mapper.select: SELECT count(recommend_id) FROM recommend WHERE member_id = #{session_id} and board_id = #{board_id}

SELECT ROUND(sum(my_v*you_v)/(SQRT(sum(power(my_v,2)))*SQRT(sum(power(you_v,2)))),5) as similarity, ${compare_member_id} as member_id FROM (SELECT NVL(c.vector,0) as my_v, NVL(d.vector,0) as you_v FROM (SELECT a.board_id, DECODE(rownum,rownum,1) as vector FROM (SELECT board_id FROM recommend where member_id = ${member_id}) a INNER JOIN (SELECT board_id,member_id FROM recommend WHERE member_id = ${compare_member_id}) b ON a.board_id = b.board_id UNION (SELECT board_id, decode(rownum,rownum,2) as vector FROM (SELECT board_id FROM recommend WHERE member_id = ${member_id} MINUS SELECT board_id FROM recommend WHERE member_id = ${compare_member_id}))) c FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT a.board_id, decode(rownum,rownum,1) as vector FROM (SELECT board_id FROM recommend WHERE member_id = ${member_id}) a INNER JOIN (SELECT board_id,member_id FROM recommend WHERE member_id = ${compare_member_id}) b ON a.board_id = b.board_id UNION (SELECT board_id, decode(rownum,rownum,2) as vector FROM (SELECT board_id FROM recommend WHERE member_id = ${compare_member_id} MINUS SELECT board_id FROM recommend WHERE member_id = ${member_id}))) d ON c.board_id = d.board_id) group by ${compare_member_id}
